Knifing Wind.name: Knifing Wind
Knifing Wind.flavor: As you slash your foe, you generate a psionic wind that knifes into your enemy’s mind.
Knifing Wind.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Storm Dance Strike.name: Storm Dance Strike
Storm Dance Strike.flavor: You become the screaming gale, encircling and buffeting your foes.
Storm Dance Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the secondary target is slowed until the end of your next turn. In addition, you teleport 5 squares and then teleport the secondary target to a square adjacent to you.
Level 21: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage.
Storm Dance Strike.effect: If you attack two creatures with this power, you teleport 5 squares between the first and the second attack. You assume the storm dance stance. Until the stance ends, you can use the power Storm Dance Attack.
Storm Dance Strike.requirement: The power Storm Dance Strike must be active in order to use this power.
Storm Dance Strike.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you moves without shifting

Mental Zephyr.name: Mental Zephyr
Mental Zephyr.flavor: You feel the bite from your enemy’s attack and let the winds howling within you infuse your flesh and pull you to safety.
Mental Zephyr.effect: You shift 1 square. Until the end of your next turn, you are insubstantial and phasing, and your attacks ignore the insubstantial quality.
